titleStmt.title: To the most hon[ble] assemblie of the high court of Parliament the humble petition of many thousands of poore distressed carpenters, bricklayers, smithes, plaisterers, glaziers, painters and other handy-crafts men.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: faded, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
